resources.string:
"A flashcard is a card bearing information on both sides, which is intended to be used as an aid in memorization. Each flashcard bears a question on one side and an answer on the other.

To understand how this works, some sample words have been added.

Once you get the hang of it, click on the pencil icon (at the top right of the screen) to add your module's words, then click the green checkmark (at the top right of the screen) to save.

Optionally, you may add the name of your current module to distinguish it by clicking on "Enter Module Name" at the top of the screen."
